pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detection and Attribution Analysis of Climate Change // Detection and attribution of climate change using methods including optimal fingerprinting via generalized total least squares or an estimating equation approach (Li et al., 2025, doi:10.1175/JCLI-D-24-0193.1; Ma et al., 2023, doi:10.1175/JCLI-D-22-0681.1). Provides shrinkage estimators for the covariance matrix following Ledoit and Wolf (2004, doi:10.1016/S0047-259X(03)00096-4) and Ledoit and Wolf (2017, doi:10.2139/ssrn.2383361).
